articles.title: Spike in Omicron Variant Cases Puts Europe on Edge - The New York Times
articles.description: With cases of the Omicron variant rising in Europe, there are worries that even tougher restrictions are looming over a holiday period that many had hoped would be a return to some normalcy.
articles.content: In parts of the United States, health officials have also seen a steady climb in the number of Omicron cases. The variant has been detected in at least 16 states: California, Colorado, Connecticut, H… [+1282 chars]
